Sentencas: This article presents the performance study of a variable-speed wind and solid oxide fuel cell-based hybrid distributed generation system, along with the energy storage devices in the grid connected mode of operation.
Titulo: Performance Analysis of a Variable-speed Wind and Fuel Cell-based Hybrid Distributed Generation System in Grid-connected Mode of Operation

Sentencas: The developed model has a salient feature of utilizing fluctuating output power of wind systems to produce hydrogen and also to charge the ultra capacitor.
Titulo: Performance Analysis of a Variable-speed Wind and Fuel Cell-based Hybrid Distributed Generation System in Grid-connected Mode of Operation

Sentencas: The presented model in the article also uses the stored energy in the ultra capacitor to compensate for the slow response time of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Performance Analysis of a Variable-speed Wind and Fuel Cell-based Hybrid Distributed Generation System in Grid-connected Mode of Operation

Sentencas: The distributed generation systems and energy storage devices considered in this study are integrated at common distributed generation links to form the hybrid system.
Titulo: Performance Analysis of a Variable-speed Wind and Fuel Cell-based Hybrid Distributed Generation System in Grid-connected Mode of Operation

Sentencas: The hybrid system is interfaced to the grid through the three-phase voltage source inverter in this article.
Titulo: Performance Analysis of a Variable-speed Wind and Fuel Cell-based Hybrid Distributed Generation System in Grid-connected Mode of Operation

Sentencas: The detailed modeling of the individual components of the hybrid distributed generation system, along with the necessary power electronic converter control schemes, are presented.
Titulo: Performance Analysis of a Variable-speed Wind and Fuel Cell-based Hybrid Distributed Generation System in Grid-connected Mode of Operation

Sentencas: The simulation results reported in this article show the effective performance of the hybrid model to produce reliable, low-cost electricity and hydrogen from the variable wind generation system.
Titulo: Performance Analysis of a Variable-speed Wind and Fuel Cell-based Hybrid Distributed Generation System in Grid-connected Mode of Operation
